name: GPT-5 mini (2025-08-07)
description: GPT-5 mini is a cost and latency-optimized version of GPT-5, designed for practical workloads requiring strong performance at lower cost. Excellent for agent-like tasks and instruction-following.
notes: Smaller, faster version of GPT-5 with reduced resource usage. Ideal for high-volume applications where GPT-5 performance isn't critical. 5x cheaper than GPT-5 for input tokens. This is the timestamped version from August 7, 2025.
